overview: From 2025-12-20 to 2025-12-21, ethereum-optimism/ecosystem had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topContributors.summary: joshklop: Focused on refining the `op-geth` codebase by merging a significant PR (#738) that removed the `storedReceiptsRLP` struct, contributing to code simplification and maintainability, alongside reviewing two other pull requests. Their code changes primarily involved other work, with a focus on tests and code files.
rdin777: Initiated work on improving static peer resilience, opening PR #18664 in ethereum-optimism/optimism, which involved modifying 1 file with a net change of +24 lines.

maradini77: Focused on preventing potential denial-of-service attacks by opening a pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18665) to add a request body size limit, involving a small but impactful code change.
serpixel: Contributed to feature work by modifying 10 files with a net addition of 204 lines across a single commit, and provided one review comment.
bbert819: Focused on identifying potential issues within the `op-geth` project by creating a new issue (ethereum-optimism/op-geth#739) to track an `eth_simulatev1` problem.
